message.body: Soraya I was just checking the border crossing requirements for Canada. We have to bring our passports. Please ask Rachel if she has a valid passport.
Also she would need to bring a letter from her parents saying they give permission for her to travel with me and it should includ their contact info.
If she doesn't have an updated passport she should bring birth certificate and driver license
Mommy has to sign a letter giving you permission to travel with her contact info.
I don't know if she can go yet!
Mentions it now so she has time to get the docs ready if she does want to go. Weather looks like it will be okay for this weekend. Yeah
What day are we going to Montreal? Sunday 4/21 returning late Monday?
Can we do Saturday return late Sunday?
Sure but most of the campus will be closed on Sunday
Okay then we can do Sunday and Monday
